jd: Hello Associates,We have a position with our Direct Client. Please find the details below. Please share only 12+ Years profilePosition: Java Developer with ReactLocation: Lansing, MIThis resource position will be supporting the MDOT Development program. As a frontend developer, responsibilities include but not limited to working with development project teams, UI/UX designers and Business analysts to develop and maintain reusable UI components that are accessible, performant, scalable, and robust. Must be familiar with WCAG 2.1, ADA compliance and responsive design. All development will be tested by the developer for accessibility using Jaws reader along with multiple browser plugins. Skills & Experience Required:Strong background with React.js. Required, 5 years.Experience with HTML5 and CSS Frameworks. Required, 5 Years.Strong knowledge and background with ADA, WCAG 2.1, Section 508 compliance policies, User Experience design principles and standards. Required, 5 years.Experience with current JAVA, this includes using relevant IDE tools such as Eclipse/Jboss Developer Studio. Required, 3 Years.Experience programming in projects using the JPA framework. Required, 2 Years.Experience programming in projects using the current Spring framework. Required, 2 Years. Experience programming with Spring Boot and Spring Data. Required, 2 Years. Experience programming with Java 8+. Required, 3 Years. Experience participating as a programmer within an Agile development environment. Required, 2 Years. Experience programming in the JBOSS Enterprise environment. Desired, 2 Years Thanks & Regards, JoshContact:517-515-6743Tekdelite LLC IEmail: Openjobs@tekdelite.com Website: tekdelite.com
